Lee Ji-yeon

Height:

Introduction

Lee Ji-yeon (이지연) is a former singing sensation in South Korea, best known for her youthful image and charming voice. She made her official debut in 1987 with her first album "Maybe You Were Young", and went on to become one of the most popular singers of her generation.

After retiring from the industry, Lee Ji-yeon devoted herself to studying and pursued her passion in the culinary world. She is currently a chef in America, co-owning HEIRLOOM MARKET BBQ.
